entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to zero this morning then steady. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries and rain showers ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to zero this morning then steady. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
